name: Spirit Gorgona: Eyes to the Beyond
description:
She looks upward — not seeking, but remembering.
Beneath the mantle, her gaze pierces layers of time.
This moment holds the weight of prophecy and the lightness of surrender.
Spirit Gorgona reflects the silent power of connection — with sky, with fate, with the unseen.
From the Myth & Motion collection — where dance, myth, and presence merge into sacred imagery.
